io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources

Interface EmbeddableResource


  • @ConsumerType
public interface EmbeddableResource
    An interface that server-side resources should implement if it's reasonable to embed their HAL representation into their context resource. For each related resource that implements this interface, isEmbedded() will be called (when the resource is rendered server-side) to determine whether to embed the resource. It's up to the resource implementation to either decide this on it's own (e.g. depending on the amount of content), or also provide a setter so that other resources can decide this after creating a resource instance to which they are linking to.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean isEmbedded()
      Determines if this resource should be embedded (rather then just linked to) from the context resource that created the resource implementation instance
      default boolean isLinkedWhenEmbedded()
      Determines if this resource should also be linked if it's already embedded in its context resource

    • Method Detail

      • isEmbedded

        default boolean isEmbedded()
        Determines if this resource should be embedded (rather then just linked to) from the context resource that created the resource implementation instance
        Returns:
        true if this resource should be embedded

      • isLinkedWhenEmbedded

        default boolean isLinkedWhenEmbedded()
        Determines if this resource should also be linked if it's already embedded in its context resource
        Returns:
        true if links to the embedded resources should be included
